name: Time Detective 3D
description:
This is an entry to the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023 hosted by zooperdan.

Theme : DUALITY

Input Keys:

  • W --> Move Forward
  • S   --> Move Backward
  • A  --> Turn Left
  • D  --> Turn Right
  • E  --> Interact
  • TAB --> Toggle Map on/off
  • F1 --> Restart Level
  • F2 --> Quit to Title Screen

Synopsis:

The space station has been place under lockdown and no transmission has been received. You are tasked to investigate the station and report the whereabouts of the crew members and the reasons leading up to the lockdown.

Due to the lockdown protocol all sectors have been shut down and most of the terminals are inoperable. The crew members experimented with quantum time travel and this may be the key to solve the mystery

The DUALITY of past and present will determine the outcome.
